YAMLConfig.name: identityEventSearchConfig
YAMLConfig.YamlText:
searchConfigDescriptors:
AccountChanged: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: attributes,application,componentIds,displayName,entitlements,extendedAttributes,instance,iiqDisabled,iiqLocked,manuallyCorrelated,nativeIdentity,uuid searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: acctAppId - property: acctAppName - property: acctAppInstance - property: acctDisplayName - property: acctNativeId - property: oldValue - property: newValue
AccountAdded: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: accounts searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: acctAppId - property: acctAppName - property: acctAppInstance - property: acctDisplayName - property: acctNativeId
AccountRemoved: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: accounts searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: acctAppId - property: acctAppName - property: acctAppInstance - property: acctDisplayName - property: acctNativeId
AssignedRoleAdded: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: roleAssignments searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: identityEntitlementId jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /identityEntitlementId - property: requestItemId jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /requestItem/id - property: pendingRequestItemId jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /pendingRequestItem/id - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /id - property: qryProperty2 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /name - property: qryProperty3 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /displayableName - property: qryProperty4 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /owner/id - property: qryProperty5 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /type
AssignedRoleRemoved: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: roleAssignments searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: identityEntitlementId jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /identityEntitlementId - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /id - property: qryProperty2 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /name - property: qryProperty3 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /displayableName - property: qryProperty4 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /owner/id - property: qryProperty5 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /type
DetectedRoleAdded: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: roleDetections searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: identityEntitlementId jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /identityEntitlementId - property: requestItemId jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /requestItem/id - property: pendingRequestItemId jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /pendingRequestItem/id - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /id - property: qryProperty2 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /name - property: qryProperty3 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /displayableName - property: qryProperty4 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /owner/id - property: qryProperty5 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /type
DetectedRoleRemoved: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: roleDetections searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: identityEntitlementId jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /identityEntitlementId - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /id - property: qryProperty2 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /name - property: qryProperty3 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /displayableName - property: qryProperty4 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /owner/id - property: qryProperty5 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /type
EntitlementRemoved: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: entitlements searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: identityEntitlementId jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /identityEntitlementId - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /appName - property: qryProperty2 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /name - property: qryProperty3 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /type - property: qryProperty4 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /value - property: qryProperty5 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /displayValue
EntitlementAdded: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: entitlements searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: identityEntitlementId jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /identityEntitlementId - property: requestItemId jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /requestItem/id - property: pendingRequestItemId jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /pendingRequestItem/id - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /appName - property: qryProperty2 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /name - property: qryProperty3 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /type - property: qryProperty4 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /value - property: qryProperty5 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /displayValue
IdentityChanged: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: name,firstname,lastname,email,isManager,displayName,displayableName,inactive,type,softwareVersion searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: oldValue - property: newValue - property: capabilities,workgroups searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: oldValue - property: newValue - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /newValue/id - property: qryProperty2 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /oldValue/id - property: manager searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: oldValue - property: newValue - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /id/oldValue - property: qryProperty2 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /id/newValue - property: forwarding,attributes,extendedAttributes,extendedAttributesIdentity,extendedAttributesNamed searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: oldValue - property: newValue - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /attributeType - property: propertyName jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /attributeName
IdentityCertificationEntityCompleted: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: certEntityCompleted searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: extractedObject attributePath: /eventImage/imageFields/id - property: qryProperty2 jsonSource: extractedObject attributePath: /eventImage/imageFields/type - property: qryProperty3 jsonSource: extractedObject attributePath: /eventImage/imageFields/name - property: qryProperty4 jsonSource: extractedObject attributePath: /eventImage/imageFields/signed
IdentityPolicyViolationChange: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: status,active searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: oldValue - property: newValue - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /attributeType - property: propertyName jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /attributeName
IdentityPolicyViolationMitigation: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: mitigationExpirations searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: oldValue - property: newValue - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /attributeType - property: propertyName jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /attributeName
